title: Video: SEVDALIZA – Marilyn Monroe
content:
Caught SEVDALIZA playing at SXSW last year, in a rather greasy converted night-club, surrounded by rowdy music industry exec’s downing shots of tequila.

Not the most encouraging setting to see a gig; yet she handled it brilliantly, with a performance as hypnotising as it was invigorating. This new video for last years’ single, Marilyn Monroe, is an FKA Twigs-esque exploration of the human body; both bizarre and thrillingly addictive. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
